scripts.deploy-everything:redi-connect: yarn run deploy-production:redi-connect && yarn run deploy-demonstration:redi-connect
scripts.deploy-everything:admin-panel: yarn run deploy-production:admin-panel && yarn run deploy-demonstration:admin-panel
scripts.deploy-production:admin-panel: env-cmd -f .env.production nx run admin-panel:build && aws s3 rm s3://connect-admin.redi-school.org/ --recursive --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && aws s3 sync dist/apps/admin-panel/ s3://connect-admin.redi-school.org --delete --acl public-read --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && yarn invalidate-cache:admin-panel:prod
scripts.deploy-demonstration:admin-panel: env-cmd -f .env.demonstration nx run admin-panel:build && aws s3 rm s3://admin.demo.connect.redi-school.org/ --recursive --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && aws s3 sync dist/apps/admin-panel/ s3://admin.demo.connect.redi-school.org --delete --acl public-read --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && yarn invalidate-cache:admin-panel:demonstration
scripts.deploy-production:redi-talent-pool:cv-bu: nx run redi-talent-pool:build && aws s3 rm s3://cv-builder.redi-school.org/ --recursive --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && aws s3 sync dist/apps/redi-talent-pool/ s3://cv-builder.redi-school.org --delete --acl public-read --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && yarn invalidate-cache:redi-talent-pool:prod:cv-builder
scripts.deploy-production:redi-connect: yarn deploy-production:redi-connect:berlin && yarn deploy-production:redi-connect:munich && yarn deploy-production:redi-connect:nrw && yarn deploy-production:redi-connect:location-picker
scripts.deploy-production:redi-connect:location-: NX_REDI_CONNECT_REDI_LOCATION=location-picker env-cmd -f .env.production nx run redi-connect:build && aws s3 rm s3://connect.redi-school.org/ --recursive --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && aws s3 sync dist/apps/redi-connect/ s3://connect.redi-school.org --delete --acl public-read --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && yarn invalidate-cache:redi-connect:prod:location-picker
scripts.deploy-production:redi-connect:berlin: NX_REDI_CONNECT_REDI_LOCATION=berlin env-cmd -f .env.production nx run redi-connect:build && aws s3 rm s3://connect.berlin.redi-school.org/ --recursive --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && aws s3 sync dist/apps/redi-connect/ s3://connect.berlin.redi-school.org --delete --acl public-read --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && yarn invalidate-cache:redi-connect:prod:berlin
scripts.deploy-production:redi-connect:munich: NX_REDI_CONNECT_REDI_LOCATION=munich env-cmd -f .env.production nx run redi-connect:build && aws s3 rm s3://connect.munich.redi-school.org/ --recursive --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && aws s3 sync dist/apps/redi-connect/ s3://connect.munich.redi-school.org --delete --acl public-read --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && yarn invalidate-cache:redi-connect:prod:munich
scripts.deploy-production:redi-connect:nrw: NX_REDI_CONNECT_REDI_LOCATION=nrw env-cmd -f .env.production nx run redi-connect:build && aws s3 rm s3://connect.nrw.redi-school.org/ --recursive --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && aws s3 sync dist/apps/redi-connect/ s3://connect.nrw.redi-school.org --delete --acl public-read --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && yarn invalidate-cache:redi-connect:prod:nrw
scripts.deploy-demonstration:redi-connect: NX_REDI_CONNECT_REDI_LOCATION=berlin env-cmd -f .env.demonstration nx run redi-connect:build && aws s3 rm s3://app.demo.connect.redi-school.org/ --recursive --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && aws s3 sync dist/apps/redi-connect/ s3://app.demo.connect.redi-school.org --delete --acl public-read --profile redi-connect-deployment --region eu-west-1 && yarn invalidate-cache:redi-connect:demonstration
